section.name: AndroMDA WebService Cartridge
section.p: Generates WSDD (Web Service Descriptor files and WSDL) files for Apache Axis.

A couple of IMPORTANT things to note:
If you want to expose a Stateless Session EJB as the provider (i.e. if your @webService.provider is EJB), this cartridge MUST be used in conjunction with either the Hibernate or EJB cartridge.
If you want to expose a POJO (Plain Old Java Object) service as the provider (i.e. if your @webService.provider is RPC), you'll need to use the cartridge with the Java cartridge since it can generate a POJO service for you.
